title: Redux Adventures
subtitle: Learn to use redux and master functional programming.

fail.constr: You didn’t use the Promise constructor
fail.createdAndUsedFunc: You didn’t create or didn’t use {{{func}}} method

fail.successHandler: Almost there! You added a success handler rather than a rejection handler to the promise in the `.then` call. Review the instructions, especially the Hints section.
fail.noHandlers: You called `.then` without any callbacks. Review the last lesson on how to use `.then` if you need to.

pass.thenBoth: Used then method with both callbacks specified

fail.thenBoth: You didn’t use then method with both callbacks specified
